text: Charles Gérard (1 December 1922 – 19 September 2019) was a French actor and director. He appeared in more than fifty movies between 1957 through 2019. He worked with director Claude Lelouch in many movies. He was a close friend of Jean-Paul Belmondo for over 60 years. His best known movies were The Toy, Animal and A Man and a Woman: 20 Years Later. Gérard died on 19 September 2019 in Paris at the age of 96.L’acteur Charles Gérard, second rôle fétiche de Claude Lelouch, est mort.
